baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼著彩色鞋履者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 158

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 85

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber, die nicht krank ist, mit einem Fahrzeug fährt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni, not being ill, ride in a vehicle, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang, tidak sedang sakit, menaiki sebuah kendaraan, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，無病，乘乘行，除時因緣，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 159

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼乘乘行。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 141

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼無病乘乘。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 145

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。不病載乘者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 111
